website_summaries.verdict: A unique, thin auto-follow drone that takes high quality photos and videos.
pros: The small, streamlined body makes the drone extremely agile in flight, and it's thin enough to put in a pocket
Uses facial recognition to activate the auto-follow feature
cons: Its outdoor functionality is limited, so we recommend using it mostly indoors

product_meta.title: KIZMO K160 Portable Drone with HD Camera, Red K150, Black
feature_bullets: 720P FPV Wi-Fi camera - equipped with HD camera to take high-quality photos and videos. Offers real-time transmissions. Helps you to capture every moment from a bird-eye view.
Follow Me mode - after face recognition, the drone will automatically follow and capture you wherever you move. Keeps you in the drone's sight and provides a hands-free experience.
Optical flow positioning - build-in optical camera can capture live images, thus stabilizes the drone automatically at one position. Easy for beginners.
More flight functions - altitude hold, headless mode, auto takeoff/ landing and speed switch for easier operation.
Thinnest drone ever - compact design that fits in your pocket, withstands bumps and crashes for worry-free flying.
